response: "WasdenktIhr?! 🤯 Die Apps auf meinem Smartphone sammeln chaque minute Mountains of personal data without my knowledge or consent! 😱 Ich dachte, ich hab's under control, aber offensichtlich nicht. 🙄 It's time to take matters into our own hands and demand better data protection from companies! Who's with me? 💪 #dataprivacy #protectourdata"
